description.en: Parse web pages for chat context. Choose browser parsing (no API key), Firecrawl API, or Jina Reader.
description.zh: 将网页解析为聊天上下文。可选浏览器解析（无需 API Key）、Firecrawl API 或 Jina Reader。
从 firecrawl.dev 获取 API Key

description.en: Optional. Get from jina.ai for higher rate limit
description.zh: 可选。从 jina.ai 获取以提高限额
